column2: "Nna David guanee fii Naiot wɔ Rama
column3: na ɔbae bɛkaa no wɔ Jonatan n’enyim dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze na mayɛ? M’emumuyɛ nye dɛn
column5: na mo bɔn a ɔwɔ w’egya enyim nye dza ɔwɔ hen
column6: ma ɔpɛ dɛ oku me yi?"

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Nyame mpa ngu; innkowu bi: hwɛ
column4: m’egya rennyɛ biribi kɛse anaa kakraba biara gyedɛ oyi kyerɛ me ana: na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn ntsi na m’egya dze dɛm asɛm yi bosuma me? Ɔnntse dɛm."

column2: "Naaso David kaa ntam
column4: W’egya nyim no yie dɛ menya w’enyim enyimnyam; na ɔase dɛ
column6: ma no werɛ nnhow. Ampaara dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi
column7: na dɛ wo kra tse ase yi
column8: ɔnamɔn pɛr na ɔda emi na owu ntamu."

column2: "Nna Jonatan see David dɛ
column4: mebɛyɛ ama wo."

column2: "Na David see Jonatan dɛ
column4: ɔkyena na bosoom fir fofor
column5: na ɔwɔ dɛ menye ɔhen tsena edzidzii: na ma monkɔ nkosuma moho wɔ haban mu
column6: ma onkodu da a otsia ebiasa no n’ewimbir."

column2: "Sɛ w’egya hwehwɛ me a
column4: David serɛɛ me kwan enyiberdo ara
column5: dɛ ɔrobɔ hwii ɔakɔ no kurow mu Bɛtlɛhɛm: na ebusua no nyinara hɔn afrenhyia afɔr no bɔ edu:"

column2: "sɛ ɔse dɛ
column4: nna asomdwee wɔ hɔ ma w’akowaa: na sɛ no bo fuw a
column5: nna ɔno hu dɛ oesua dɛ ɔbɛyɛ bɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi enye w’akowaa ndzi no ayamuyie mu: osiandɛ EWURADZE n’ahyɛmu na ama w’akowaa enye wo ahɛn mu: na sɛ emumuyɛ bi wɔ mo mu a
column3: ɔwoara ku me; na ebɛnadze ntsi na edze me bɛma w’egya."

column2: "Na Jonatan see dɛ
column3: Iyi mpar wo: na sɛ minyim ara dɛ m’egya esua dɛ ɔbɛyɛ wo bɔn a
column4: aso nkyɛ mennkɛka akyerɛ wo?"

column2: "Nna David see Jonatan dɛ
column3: Sɛ gyangyanbiara w’egya bua wo ebufuw mu a
column4: woana bɛka akyerɛ me?"

column2: "Na Jonatan see David dɛ
column3: Bra ma yɛnkɔ haban mu. Na hɔn beenu nyina sii mu kɔr haban mu."

column2: "Na Jonatan see David dɛ
column4: ɔnyɛ dasefo: ɔkyena
column5: anaa ɔkyena n’adzekyee siseber yi na mahwehwɛ n’adwen mu ehu mu
column7: sɛ papa bi wɔ wo ho a
column8: ɔno mobɔsoma ma ɔaaba wo hɔ
column9: na ɔaabɛda no edzi akyerɛ wo."

column2: "Sɛ m’egya nya pɛ dɛ ɔbɛyɛ wo bɔn
column3: na sɛ mannda no edzi mannkyerɛ wo
column4: na manngya wo kwan ma aannkɔ no asomdwee mu a
column6: na dza ɔkyɛn dɛm so: na EWURADZE ndzi w’ekyir
column7: dɛ mbrɛ oedzi m’egya n’ekyir no."

column2: "Na afei meda ho tse ase yi fa EWURADZE n’ayamuyie yɛ me
"na nkyii so mma nntwa w’ayamuyie do mmfi me fie da: oho
column3: nnyɛ aber mpo a EWURADZE etwa David n’atamfo nyinara efi asaase enyi no a."

column2: "Mma mma wontwa Jonatan dzin mmfi David fie da. EWURADZE nye David n’atamfo ndzi no dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ."
"Na Jonatan maa David kaa ntam bio
column3: wɔ dɔ a ɔdze dɔ no no ntsi: osiandɛ ɔdɔɔ no dɛ mbrɛ ɔdɔɔ noara ne kra."

column2: "Nna Jonatan see no dɛ
column3: Ɔkyena na bosoom fir fofor: na wɔbɔhwehwɛ wo
column4: osiandɛ w’egua bɛda hɔ pan."

column2: "Na sɛ idzi ndaansa a
column3: ɔno kɔ ntsɛntsɛm ara na bra beebi mbrɛ aber a edwuma no wɔ do no
column4: isumaa woho wɔ hɔ no

column2: "Na mobɔtow egyen menaba ebiasa wɔ wo nkyɛn
"Na
column4: mobɔsoma abofra dɛ
column6: kɔhwehwɛ egyen menaba no. Sɛ mese abofra no dɛ
column8: egyen menaba no wɔ wo nkyɛmfamu ha: tase
column9: na bra a; nna asomdwee wɔ hɔ ma wo na bɔn bi nnyi hɔ

column2: "Na sɛ mese abofra no dɛm dɛ
column4: egyen menaba no wɔ w’enyim noho a: ɔno kɔ wo kwan; na EWURADZE agya wo kwan."

column2: "Na asɛm a emi na ɔwo aka ho asɛm no dze
column4: EWURADZE gyina emi na ɔwo ntamu daa."

column2: "Nna David dze noho kosumaa haban mu: na bosoom fiir fofor no
"Na ɔhen no tsenaa n’egua do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛ no daa no
column4: mekyerɛ ban ho egua no do a; na Jonatan tsenaa n’enyim
column5: na Abner tsenaa Saul ne nkyɛn: na David ne tsenabew no dze ɔdaa pan."

column2: "Naaso Saul annka asɛm bi da no: na ɔdween dɛ
column4: no ho nntsew; ampaara no ho nntsew."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ bosoom fiir fofor no adzekyee no a ɔyɛ da a otsia ebien no
column3: David ne tsenabew no daa pan: na Saul bisaa ne ba Jonatan dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na Jesse ne ba no ammba edzidzii ndeda na ndɛ yi?"

column2: "Na Jonatan buaa Saul dɛ
column3: David serɛɛ me kwan enyiberdo ara dɛ ɔrokɔ Bɛtlɛhɛm:"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: ma monkɔ; na hɛn ebusua wɔ afɔr bɔ wɔ kurow no mu; na mo nua ahyɛ me dɛ monkɔ hɔ: na afei
column7: ma monkɔ monkɔhwɛ mo nuanom. Dɛm ntsi na ɔammba ɔhen no pon ho."

column2: "Nna Saul n’ebufuw dzɛɛw Jonatan do
column4: Ɔwo ɔbaa brakyewnyi etuatsewnyi ne ba
column5: ana minnyim dɛ afa Jesse ne ba no nyɛnko dze rehyɛ wankasa woho
column6: na wo na n’adagyaw ho enyito bi a?"

column2: "Na aber tsentsen ara a Jesse ne ba no tse ase yi
column3: ɔwo na w’ahendzi so rinngyina. Dɛm ntsi afei soma ma wɔnkɛfa no mbrɛ me
column4: na owu na obowu."

column2: "Na Jonatan buaa n’egya Saul na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na woboku no? Ebɛnadze na ɔayɛ?"

column2: "Na Saul toow ne peaa no wɔ no do dɛ ɔdze rowɔ no; na ɔnam iyi do na Jonatan hun dɛ n’egya oesua dɛ oboku David."
"Nna Jonatan dze ebufuhyew soɛree fii pon no ho
column3: na oenndzi edziban biara bosoom ne da a otsia ebien no mu: na odzii awerɛhow wɔ David ntsi
column4: osiandɛ n’egya ahyɛ no fɛr."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column4: Jonatan puei kɔr haban mu wɔ aber a ɔnye David hyɛe no ara mu
column5: na abofra kakraba bi ka no ho."

column2: "Na ɔsee n’abofra no dɛ
column4: na kɔhwehwɛ egyen menaba a morotow yi. Na abofra no tuu mbirika rokɔ no
column5: ɔtoow egyen menaba ma ɔtraa no."

column2: "Na abofra no dur mbrɛ egyen menaba a Jonatan towee no wɔ no
column3: Jonatan tseatseaa mu wɔ abofra no n’ekyir see dɛ
column4: Ana egyen menaba no nnyi w’enyim noho bi a?"

column2: "Na Jonatan tseatseaa mu wɔ abofra no n’ekyir dɛ
column4: yɛ ntsɛm
column5: mma nngyina. Na Jonatan n’abofra no tasee egyen menaba no

column2: "Nna abofra no nnyim ho hwee: Jonatan na David nko na wonyim asɛm no."
"Na Jonatan dze n’akodze maa abofra no
column4: Duom

column2: "Na abofra no kɔree ara
column3: nna David soɛree fii beebi mbrɛ odzi kɔ Pomu afamu no
column4: na ɔdaan n’enyim bobutuuw famu
column5: na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze mpɛn ebiasa: na wofifeew hɔn ano
column6: na wosui araa ma David nedze boor do."

column2: "Na Jonatan see David dɛ
column4: susuampa dɛ hɛn beenu nyina akeka ntam wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu
column6: EWURADZE ntsena emi na ɔwo ntamu
column7: na m’asefo na w’asefo ntamu daa no. Na ɔsoɛree na osii mu kɔree: na Jonatan kɔr kurow no mu."
